name: Brick and Ball - Brick Breaker
description:
Bricks Ball is an addictive brick elimination game. Launch small balls to eliminate all the bricks.
Physical pinball is super fun, hit all the bricks, hit hard, and spend your free time together!

The rules are simple:
Hold the screen and drag to aim, let go to launch all the pinballs, and easily break all the bricks!
The bricks will continue to fall from above, and the only goal is to prevent the bricks from reaching the bottom line!

Very distinctive:
Perfect physical marbles;
Endless free levels;
Control operation is simple and easy to learn

Bricks Ball is suitable for people of all ages to play!
Hit violently, make you enjoyable, start now!
